SELECT DISTINCT SECURITY_NO AS ID, SECURITY_NO AS SECURITYNO, RECORD_TYPE AS RECORDTYPE, MENU_TYPE AS MENUTYPE, MENU_ID AS MENUID, TOP_MENU_ID AS TOPMENUID, TOP_MENU_ID AS PARENT, MENU_ORD AS MENUORD, WINDOW_ID AS WINDOWID, WINDOW_DESC AS WINDOWDESC, NOT_COMMAND_ID AS NOTCOMMANDID, DESCRIPTION AS DESCRIPTION, NVL( (SELECT MEANING FROM ABA_CO_FND_LOOKUP_VALUES WHERE CCODE_GROUP = 'MenuNameCd'AND CCODE = DESCRIPTION_MSG AND LANGUAGE = 'en' AND LANGUAGE = #{lang} ), DESCRIPTION) AS DESCRIPTIONMSG, (LEVEL-1)||'' AS MENULEVEL, ACCESS_URL AS accessUrl, ICON_CLASS AS iconClass FROM (SELECT DISTINCT E.* FROM ABA_OR_USER A, ABA_SE_GROUP_USER_LINK B, ABA_SE_GROUP_PROFILE_LINK C, ABA_SE_AUTH_PROFILE_LINK D, ABA_CO_SECURITY_ELEMENTS E WHERE A.USER_ID = #{userId} AND A.USER_ID = B.USER_ID AND B.GROUP_SEQ = C.GROUP_SEQ AND C.PROFILE_ID = D.PROFILE_ID AND D.AUTH_ID = TO_CHAR(E.SECURITY_NO) AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') BETWEEN EFFECTIVE_DATE8 AND EXPIRATION_DATE8) X WHERE X.RECORD_TYPE = #{recordType} START WITH X.TOP_MENU_ID IS NULL AND SECURITY_NO = #{securityNo} CONNECT BY PRIOR X.SECURITY_NO = X.TOP_MENU_ID ORDER SIBLINGS BY MENU_ORD
